metadata.title: CVE-2022-23990 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.4 has an integer overflow in the doPrologfunction.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
